# Overview
The primary goal of this glossary is to clarify meanings of selected terms and acronyms that appear frequently in the .NET documentation without definitions.

# Glossary Components
+ [Diagram Mermaid Edit Online](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#-IGNvcmVjbHJbQ29yZSBDTFI6IENvcmUgQ0xSXVxuICBnbCAtLT4gY29yZXJ0W0NvcmUgUlRdXG4gIGdsIC0tPiBjcm9zc3BsYXRmb3JtW0Nyb3NzIFBsYXRmb3JtXVxuICBnbCAtLT4gZWNvc3lzdGVtW0Vjb3N5c3RlbV1cbiAgZ2wgLS0-)

+ [Diagram View](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#-IGNvcmVjbHJbQ29yZSBDTFI6IENvcmUgQ0xSXVxuICBnbCAtLT4gY29yZXJ0W0NvcmUgUlRdXG4gIGdsIC0tPiBjcm9zc3BsYXRmb3JtW0Nyb3NzIFBsYXRmb3JtXVxuICBnbCAtLT4gZWNvc3lzdGVtW0Vjb3N5c3RlbV1cbiAgZ2wgLS0-)

+ [Diagram Mermaid Code]
```mermaid
graph LR
  gl[Glossary] --> aot[Aheard-of-time, Similar to JIT]
  gl --> asp.net[ASP.NET]
  gl --> asp.netcore[ASP.NET Core]
  gl --> assembly[Assembly]
  gl --> bcl[BCL: Base Class Library]
  gl --> clr[CLR: Common Language Runtime]
  gl --> coreclr[Core CLR: Core CLR]
  gl --> corert[Core RT]
  gl --> crossplatform[Cross Platform]
  gl --> ecosystem[Ecosystem]
  gl --> framewrok[Framework]
  gl --> gc[GC: Garbage Collector]
  gl --> il[IL: Intermediate Language]
  gl --> jit[JIT: Just-in-time]
``
